name: Winning is Fun!
description:
The most fun you can have in a game is winning, that's why we've devised the perfect game where you can always win!  With our perfectly crafted fun-zones, losing is a thing of the past!  Experience the thrill of jumping over bottomless pits, narrowly avoiding spikes, and squeezing past a flurry of saw blades with our 100% fool proof guarantee that you will NOT be hurt by them.

Losing is so unlikely, you shouldn't even bother trying to lose!

Controls:

WSAD/Arrow Keys - Move

Z/Space Bar - Jump

Jump while against wall - Wall Jump

Source:

Winning is Fun is written in GMS2 and is open source.  The code for this project can be found here.

All assets and code used for this project are free to be used for other projects.  We'd appreciate credit and a link if you use anything we made!
